com.jjoe64.graphview.series

Interface OnDataPointTapListener


  • public interface OnDataPointTapListener
    Listener for the tap event which will be triggered when the user touches on a datapoint. Use this in BaseSeries.setOnDataPointTapListener(OnDataPointTapListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTap(Series series, DataPointInterface dataPoint)
      gets called when the user touches on a datapoint.

    • Method Detail

      • onTap

        void onTap(Series series,
           DataPointInterface dataPoint)
        gets called when the user touches on a datapoint.
        Parameters:
        series - the corresponding series
        dataPoint - the data point that was tapped on
